document_data.name: Laksi al-Afyid
document_data.mainbody: '''Laksi al-Afyid''' was was a [[merchant-rogue]] and business woman in [[Huzuz]].
document_data.Abilities: She possessed a natural talent for catering to the rich and powerful. Clients could relax in her shop in comfort while her servants collected their request from the Bazaar.
document_data.Activities: Instead of offering guide services like others in Huzuz, Laksi preferred to offer procurement services where clients told her what they needed. She operated her shop, [[Services for Nobles]], out of a lavish house located near the [[Grand Bazaar]] and [[Court District]].
